hero.title: Make a Difference Today
hero.subtitle: Support Our Mission
hero.description: Your contribution helps empower women and children across Africa through education, healthcare, and economic opportunities.

impact.title: Your Impact
impact.description: See how your donation makes a real difference in the lives of women and children across Africa.

metrics.title: Educational Support
metrics.description: Provide books, supplies, and scholarships to students in need

metrics.title: Economic Empowerment
metrics.description: Fund microloans for women entrepreneurs to start businesses

metrics.title: Healthcare Access
metrics.description: Provide medical care and health education to communities

testimonials.quote: The scholarship I received changed my life. I am now able to pursue my dream of becoming a doctor and help my community.
testimonials.name: Amara N.

testimonials.quote: With the microloan, I started my own business selling handmade goods. Now I can support my family and send my children to school.
testimonials.name: Fatima K.

testimonials.quote: The healthcare program brought vital services to our village. Our children are healthier and our mothers are safer.
testimonials.name: Nia M.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How is my donation used?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Your donation directly supports our programs in education, healthcare, and economic empowerment. We ensure that at least 85% of all donations go directly to program services.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Yes, all donations are tax-deductible to the full extent allowed by law as we are a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Can I specify which program my donation supports?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Yes, you can designate your donation to support a specific program. Just include a note with your donation specifying your preference.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How can I see the impact of my donation?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: We provide regular updates through our newsletter, annual reports, and impact stories on our website. You can also follow our social media channels for real-time updates.
